description: Park the car and walk up a short track (about 50m) to this rustic stone farmhouse with panoramic views of the surrounding valley. A traditional oasis serving delicious local cuisine with a light touch and the occasional Mediterranean influence where, in summer, meals are served at stone tables in the delightful outdoor area with stunning views of the surrounding countryside.
